DOC.brief_summary: The purpose research compare patient aneurysmal subarachnoid hemorrhage dexmedetomidine compare propofol assess one group decrease inflammation . The investigator hypothesis group assign receive dexmedetomidine profound decrease marker inflammation time .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Dexmedetomidine Inflammatory Cytokines Patients With Aneurysmal Subarachnoid Hemorrhage
DOC.criteria: Aneurysmal subarachnoid hemorrhage World Federation Neurological Surgeons ( WFNS ) grade 45 ( see table ) Surgical intervention clip coil Placement cerebrospinal fluid drain ( lumbar ventricular ) Mechanically ventilated start infusion Hemodynamic instability ( SBP < 100 , HR < 60 , continuous infusion catecholamine ) screen Heart failure class III IV ( New York Heart Association ) Renal failure ( RIFLE classification see table ) Liver failure ( serum protein < 3 g/dL total bilirubin > 5 mg/dL ) Known suspect brain death Pregnancy Unable receive dexmedetomidine within 48 hour injury 4 hour surgery Allergy dexmedetomidine Prisoners
